reviewText: I could not watch more than 10 minutes. I volunteer at a shelter and plan on adopting a pit. I could not get anything from this DVD. There are better you tube tutorials. Save your money and buy something else.

expected a little more in depth information.it does help.gives quick basics on trianing ,(useful) not enough on
nutrition.recomended for those w/out canine knowledge. cd in great condition.

Unfortunatly I didn't learn much of anything about Pit Bulls that I didn't already know.  I guess if you had absolutely no knowledge of the breed you may find it interesting.  Example from the cover "Maintain your Pit Bull's optimum health with this essential diet" The answer on the dvd was "feed a high quality diet".
